title: The Hundred and One Dalmations
description: ‘Wouldn’t they make enchanting fur coats?’ simpers the devious Cruella de Vil – one of children’s literature’s most diabolical villains – upon meeting Pongo and Missus, beloved Dalmatians of Mr and Mrs Dearly. But when the Dalmatians’ pups are stolen from their London home and held hostage at Hell Hall, Cruella’s stately country house, the dogs of Britain unite to help their parents cross England to rescue them in time for Christmas.
author: Dodie Smith
